features: MAN BAR SOAP WHERE LATHER MEETS LUXURY – Our Man Bar is the perfect soap for whatever kind of many you are. We blend the finest ingredients in a variety of masculine fragrances to provide top quality personal care products. Use this bar soap at the sink or in the shower to leave your skin squeaky clean and refreshed
NO HARMFUL INGREDIENTS - Our products are natural in origin, and we never use harsh chemicals or synthetics like parabens, sulfates, phthalates, or silicones.

CLEAN - When stranded on an island, don't be found smelling like all the fish in the Seven Seas. Coastal Driftwood with its fresh and crisp fragrance made of bright citrus, salted water and blue sage will keep you clean and rescue ready. Ahoy, matey.

MAKES A GREAT GIFT - Give the gift of a routine upgrade so everyone can smell like a champion! The industry-leading packaging of Man Bar ensures that each bar is visually appealing and rugged enough for any adventure for any man..

MADE IN THE USA AND CRUELTY FREE, NO ANIMAL TESTING - Our state-of-the-art soap & toiletries factory is located in southeastern Massachusetts. We take pride in our unique formulations that blend only the finest ingredients; no chemicals that are harmful to your skin. Our top-quality soap gently cleanses and leaves your skin feeling smooth and nourished, rather than stripped dry.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: San Francisco Soap Company Coastal Driftwood Man Bar Make your manly skin smell and look amazing with the Coastal Driftwood Man Bar from San Francisco Soap Company. The San Francisco Soap Company creates all their products with one goal in mind, to provide only high-quality products without using harmful fillers and chemicals that big label companies use. Our soap gently cleanses and leaves skin feeling smooth and nourished, rather than stripped and dry. We take pride in our unique formulation that blends only the finest ingredients. This bar is 10 oz. San Francisco Soap Company - USA Made We are a manufacturer of USA MADE personal care products. Our state-of-the-art facilities are located in southeastern Massachusetts. Our unique formulations are intended to keep your skin smooth and healthy. Our soaps are large, they are meant to last and not dissolve away to a bar of nothing like most soaps do! Be sure to check out our other listings for more fine quality long lasting soap for your skin and your hair! Be a Rockstar with Quality Ingredients Our products consist of unique formulas with no harmful ingredients. We are constantly developing new items and designs that we look forward to sharing with our customers, while adhering to the fine tradition of the exceptional locally made quality that embodies the San Francisco Soap Company. The Man Bar Product Line! The San Francisco Soap Company makes some amazing soaps in different formats that our customers love - all the way from hand soap in a pump bottle to bar soaps and soap on-a-rope! The soaps are large and long lasting. Check out the San Francisco Soap Company storefront to learn more about our product line.
You've tried the rest, now try the best!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bar of soap is big. It smells fantastic! It lathers like no other. It last a long time from other reviews I'd read. What more do you want? Buy it! Go ahead!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great huge bar of soap
reviews.reviewText: First, the size of the bar is very large, which is not a bad thing; however, it is very slippery. Just don't drop it on your toe.The scent is great, and smells somewhat similar to Old Spice aftershave.The bar lasts a long time. Look at picture number 3 to see what it looks like after a month of use. Still pretty big.Finally, the box it came in was unexpected. It is a solid thick box with a magnetic clasp. See pictures #1 and #2. The box is so nice, I'm saving it to put coins in.Overall, I am very happy with the soap and will be ordering again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great smelling soap! Beautiful packaging! I really enjoy the products from San Francisco Soap Company. This one included!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large Bar - Great Scent
reviews.reviewText: Nice scent and easily lasts over a month. Ordered another scent from the SF Soap Co.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One bar last two to three times as long as regular bars of soap. The different options as far as smell are great. I have been using this product for about a year now and no plans for switching back to other soaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells good and longevity good. I would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SMELLS SO GOOD!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a stocking stuffer for my son. The smell is fresh and masculine. It leaves your skin soft. We will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks and smells amazing.
reviews.reviewText: This soap looks as good as it smells. Even the box feels fancy. Treat yourself to a bar of this today!
